briefTitle: Implementation and Quality Assurance of DPYD-genotyping in Patients Treated With Fluoropyrimidines.
officialTitle: Implementation and Quality Assurance of DPYD-genotyping in Patients Treated With Fluoropyrimidines
conditions: Adverse Drug Event, Colon Cancer, Breast Cancer, Pancreas Cancer, Rectal Cancer, Gastric Cancer, Oesophageal Cancer, Bile Duct Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients with cancer that are eligible for systemic treatment with 5-FU, capecitabine, or tegafur.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients that earlier have been treated with 5-FU, capecitabine, or tegafur
